title: Services
description: What can I do for you?

services.title: Front-End Web Development
services.detail: Developing Front-end by HTML5, CSS3,  JavaScript(jQuery, React.js or Vue.js) and Ruby on Rails.

services.title: Back-End Web Development
services.detail: Developing Back-end by C# (ASP.NET Web API) or Java with Oracle Database or PostgreSQL, Python with AWS services (Lambda, DynamoDB, SES, S3).

services.title: Windows Desktop Application Development
detail: Developing Windows Desktop Apps by C# with Oracle Database or PostgreSQL.
Or can developing without using any databases.

services.title: Tech Lead
detail: Developing any frameworks and libraries for projects, also creating development rules.
Technical supporting and educating project members.
